mapper.select: SELECT s.shop_id ,s.title ,s.contents ,s.price ,s.created_date ,s.is_enable ,s.category_code ,s.category_etc_code ,s.point ,s.user_id ,s.size ,s.stock ,s.brand ,s.main_img ,u.user_name FROM SHOP s JOIN USER u ON s.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND IS_ENABLE = 'Y' AND SHOP_ID = #{shop_id}
